title: Ars Nouveau's Flavors & Delight
description: Adding 49+ food made with Ars Nouveau's ingredients in Farmer's Delight style, and mechanics that interacts with spells and rituals
body:
This mod adds 49+ food made with Ars Nouveau's ingredient in the style of Farmer's Delight.

![all items and blocks](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/BwbT0OZE/images/e581924fcf599a65f4acc810653d7874cd2a4a2a.jpeg)
Drygmy farming with Enchanter's Knife
![drygmy farming with enchanter's knife](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/BwbT0OZE/images/3e195afe82795caadb757bae3ae9e678a1285977.png)

Adding 7 ingredients:
- Flourishing/Vexing/Cascading/Blazing barks
- Wilden meat dropped by killing wilden hunter with knife
- Chimera meat dropped by killing chimera with knife
- Chimera horn dropped by killing chimera with axe

Adding 5 effects:
- Blast Resistance: reduce incoming explosion damage.
- Freezing Spell: your spell damage inflict freezing effect.
- Flourishing: when you heals, restore mana at the same time
- synchronized Shield: when you heals, restore absorption at the same time, up to 4 hearts
- Wilden: increase max mana, mana restoration, and spell damage

Adding 10 block food:
- Feast: Wilden Salad
- Feast: Honey Glazed Chimera
- 4 Pie
- 4 Jelly


![items](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/BwbT0OZE/images/7b85c05aafbbea62307bf59cd81f98cca6bca44c.png)
![items](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/BwbT0OZE/images/17c58ac9d04fe2d047c9097a3fea5a6e6183b568.png)
![blocks](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/BwbT0OZE/images/7ae45bc3b5084c7be88707169523af9a11d8c457.png)
![patchouli](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/BwbT0OZE/images/55e0956e5af01ec4d0b8c2f7d04495405d46783b.png)
Adding 49 food, including:
- 10 block food (feasts, pie, jelly)
- 9 drinks
- 7 platters
- 4 soup/sauce
- 7 snacks
- 12 meat/skewers
